dataQualitySummary.title: Data Quality Summary
dataQualitySummary.description: High-level summary of the data quality characterization provided for the dataset.

measures.description: Set of measures describing the quality of the object

name.description: Name/title for this data quality summary metric

description.description: Description of this data quality summary metric

value.description: Value for this data quality summary metric

units.description: Units, if any, for this data quality summary metric

showAsSummary.description: Designation of whether this entry is considered to the overall summary score for the object; if not specified, assumed to be false

showAsGraphic.description: Designation of whether this entry is to be included in an optional graphic (e.g., a chart) summarizing the quality of the object; if not specified, assumed to be false

graphicLegend.description: Legend to be used for this entry if it is to be included in an optional graphic summarizing the quality of the object

notes.description: Notes, if any, to accompany this entry

referenceURL.description: URL for reference providing additional information about the data quality summary

notes.description: Notes, if any, providing additional relevant context for the quality characterization of the dataset or object
